Episodes.Title: Meaning
Episodes.Plot: After recovering from his gunshot wounds, House works feverishly on two cases at the same time: a paralyzed man who drove his wheelchair into a swimming pool and a woman who became paralyzed after a yoga session.
Episodes.GuestStars: Remy Thorne, Terry Rhoads, Eamon Hunt, Edward Edwards, Carter Jenkins, Clare Kramer, Kathleen Quinlan

Episodes.Title: Cane & Able
Episodes.Plot: House and the team treat a young boy who claims there is a tracking device in his neck and believes he has been the subject of alien experimentation. Cameron is outraged when she learns Cuddy and Wilson have been lying to House about the diagnosis on his last case.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sheryl Lee, Johnny Sneed, Edward Edwards, Skyler Gisondo

Episodes.Title: Informed Consent
Episodes.Plot: House puts a well-known medical researcher through a battery of tests to determine why he collapsed in his lab. When the team is unable to diagnose the problem, the doctor asks the team to help him end his life. House is forced to use his cane again after the ketamine has worn off as he deals with a clinic patient's teenaged daughter who has a crush on him.
Episodes.GuestStars: Joel Grey, William Charlton, Leighton Meester

Episodes.Title: Lines in the Sand
Episodes.Plot: When doctors are unable to diagnose why a severely autistic boy screams loudly for no apparent reason, House takes the case. As the boy's condition worsens, it becomes obvious that House relates to the boy because he has no social niceties.
Episodes.GuestStars: Johnny Crear, Leighton Meester, Kat Sawyer-Young, Heather Kafka, Geoffrey Blake, Braeden Lemasters

Episodes.Title: Fools for Love
Episodes.Plot: House takes the case of a young woman who has been rushed to the hospital with problems breathing and severe stomach pain after she and her husband were robbed. After her husband collapses, the team believes the couple's illnesses are related. Meanwhile, Michael Tritter, a clinic patient, causes problems for House that could have serious ramifications.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sam Ayers, Carissa Koutantzis, Rod Damer, Scott Allen Rinker, Brett Wagner, Kimberly Quinn, Ricky Ullman, Jurnee Smollett

Episodes.Title: Que Será Será
Episodes.Plot: The team encounters logistical problems while trying to run tests on a 600-pound man due to his extremely large size. Meanwhile, House spends the night in jail after being arrested by Detective Tritter for various charges, including resisting arrest.
Episodes.GuestStars: Mary Elizabeth Ellis, Kadeem Hardison, Stephanie Venditto, Pruitt Taylor Vince, Alan Frazier, Michael James Faradie, Ryan Brockington, Bruno Amato, Richard Chance, Denver Dowridge, Jim Vickers, Damien Wayans, Co

Episodes.Title: Son of Coma Guy
Episodes.Plot: House decides to awaken a comatose patient so he can question the man regarding the family history of his son, who may have a genetic condition and the father is the only living relative. Meanwhile, Wilson confronts House about the stolen prescription pad as Tritter approaches Cameron, Chase, and Foreman in an attempt to divide the team and reveal their loyalties.
Episodes.GuestStars: Holly Kaplan, John Larroquette, Zeb Newman, Jonathan Strait

Episodes.Title: Whac-A-Mole
Episodes.Plot: An 18-year-old teenager is brought to the hospital after having a heart attack. House reviews the boy's file and believes he has the diagnosis. He then turns the case into a game by sealing his opinion in an envelope and challenging Cameron, Foreman, and Chase to guess House's diagnosis on their own. Meanwhile, Tritter's actions against Wilson continue to strain the oncologist's relationship with House and destroy his ability to practice medicine.
Episodes.GuestStars: Deborah Lacey, Alan Rosenberg, Mandy June Turpin, Dustin Seavey, Tanner Blaze, Patrick Birkett, Patrick Fugit, Cassius Willis, Cassi Thomson, Dorothea Harahan

Episodes.Title: Finding Judas
Episodes.Plot: House takes the case of a young girl who has been diagnosed with pancreatitis. When he takes her divorced parents to court to force them to allow treatment because they can't agree, the judge awards guardianship of the girl to Cuddy. Meanwhile, Tritter continues his strategy to force House to admit to his drug use by offering one of the team members a deal.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jordana Capra, Jodi Long, Paula Cale, Christopher Gartin, Alyssa Shafer

Episodes.Title: Merry Little Christmas
Episodes.Plot: Wilson arranges for House to make a deal with Tritter, but House refuses. Meanwhile, Cuddy cuts House off Vicodin and removes him from the team's case: a 15-year-old little person who entered the hospital with a collapsed lung and anemia.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cole Evan Weiss, Shyann McClure, Teddy Vincent, Michael Medico, Meredith Eaton-Gilden, Kacie Borrowman, David Morse

Episodes.Title: Words and Deeds
Episodes.Plot: House splits his time between treating a firefighter for uncontrollable shivering, giving Tritter a piece of his mind, and handling his trial for forging prescriptions.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jason George, Hira Ambrosino, Aulani Rhea, Terryn Westbrook, Tory Kittles, Martin Mullen, Brian Leckner, David Morse, Meagan Good, Vyto Ruginis, Helen Carey, Kadeem Hardison, Donald Sage MacKay

Episodes.Title: One Day, One Room
Episodes.Plot: While House is forced to work full-time in the clinic and deal with a rape victim who insists on confiding with him, Cameron deals with a terminal cancer patient trying to take advantage of her state of mind.
Episodes.GuestStars: Sean Christopher Davis, Todd Sandler, Roger Ainslie, George Williams, Michelle Gardner, Randy Evans, Ray Chavez, Michael Rivkin, Nick Slatkin, Jason Gallloway, Joel David Moore, Hope Shapiro, Marco Pelaez, Bryna

Episodes.Title: Needle in a Haystack
Episodes.Plot: House and his staff must deal with a teenage Gypsy boy suffering from inexplicable respiratory distress. However, House has bigger issues on his mind: Cuddy has given away his handicapped spot.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jake Richardson, Maxine Hayden, Joni Barth, Tyrace Richardson, Antonio D. Charity, Tasha Taylor, Hira Ambrosino, Sandra Purpuro, David Kelsey, Rob Brownstein, Jessy Schram, Wendy Makkena, Arabella Field

Episodes.Title: Insensitive
Episodes.Plot: It's Valentine's Day, and Cuddy has a blind date. Meanwhile, House leaves ER duty to take the case of a child patient named Hannah.
Episodes.GuestStars: Cindy Lu, Aulani Rhea, Ingrid Sanai Buron, Jenny Robertson, Mika Boorem, Josh Stamberg, Kimberly Quinn, Ruth Silveira

Episodes.Title: Half-Wit
Episodes.Plot: House encounters a brain-damaged musical prodigy with inexplicable abilities while the team faces serious concerns about House's own health.
Episodes.GuestStars: Scott Weintraub, Tyler Patton, Dave Matthews, Dru Mouser, Kurtwood Smith, Bobbin Bergstrom, Kendra Cover, Ingrid Sanai Buron

Episodes.Title: Top Secret
Episodes.Plot: The ex-marine that saved House's life, in a dream he had the day before, is admitted in the hospital with symptoms resembling Gulf War Syndrome. While House is busy dealing with his own health issues, and Chase and Cameron are too busy with each other, the ex-marine gets worse.
Episodes.GuestStars: Bert Belasco, Marco Morales, Keisha Alfred, Hira Ambrosino, Annie Quinn, Marc Blucas

Episodes.Title: Fetal Position
Episodes.Plot: A famous celebrity photographer suffers from a stroke while being pregnant at her early forties. House and his team have to deal with a great dilemma, save the mother or her unborn child.
Episodes.GuestStars: Jeff Sugarman, Tyson Ritter, Anne Elizabeth Ramsay

Episodes.Title: Airborne
Episodes.Plot: On House and Cuddy's flight from Singapore a passenger gets ill and Cuddy suspects an epidemic. At the hospital, Wilson leads the team as they deal with a middle-aged woman suffering from seizures.
Episodes.GuestStars: Ben Carroll, Gayla Goehl, Jenny O'Hara, Tess Lina, Meta Golding, Connor Webb, Melissa Kite, Pej Vahdat, Krista Kalmus, Jamison Yang, Karla Droege

Episodes.Title: Act Your Age
Episodes.Plot: A 6-year-old girl suffers ailments expected in patients much older. Tensions between Chase and Cameron lead House to intentionally assign them to the same tasks, including investigating the young girl's home.
Episodes.GuestStars: Marcus Folman, Ellery Sprayberry, Joel David Moore, Carla Gallo, Slade Pearce, Bailee Madison, Erich Anderson

Episodes.Title: House Training
Episodes.Plot: The doctors try to find what's wrong with a scam artist who collapses after her brain "freezes," but the case becomes personal for Foreman.
Episodes.GuestStars: Monique Gabriela Curnen, Bobbin Bergstrom, Aulani Rhea, Thomas Lee Webbs, Charles F. Porter, Jane Adams, Beverly Todd, Charles S. Dutton

Episodes.Title: Family
Episodes.Plot: Wilson prepares to transplant bone marrow from Matty to his brother Nick. But when Matty gets sick, the team must cure him as he's the only safe donor. Meanwhile Foreman deals with the consequences of his mistake and House has a battle of wills with his new pet Hector.

Episodes.Title: Resignation
Episodes.Plot: The team deals with a 19-year-old college student, while Foreman suddenly and without a reason hands in his resignation. House seems to have already found Foreman's replacement, an attractive nutritionist named Honey.

Episodes.Title: The Jerk
Episodes.Plot: House treats a 16-year-old chess prodigy who gets everyone on the team annoyed with his behavior. Foreman is upset with House because he thinks his boss sabotaged his job interview with another hospital.

Episodes.Title: Human Error
Episodes.Plot: A Cuban couple attempt to get to America by raft... to see House about the wife's heart condition. But when she gets worse House wonders if someone on his staff messed up. Meanwhile Foreman prepares to leave and his departure threatens to shake up the entire team.
